name: Shatter of Time
description:
My college final project, will be periodically updated with new content and fixes.

Mainly inspired by Portal, the player has to use react quickly and solve puzzles to traverse through the levels. The twist is: time control, the player is able to slow down and reverse time to aid in completion of the game.

Controls:

Movement : WASD

Pick Up Object : E

Reverse Time : Left Mouse Button

Slow Down Time : Right Mouse Button

Planned Updates:

- UI.

- Add sounds.

- Add extra levels.

Will happily appreciate any feedback and suggestions !
